tool.name: MotifGen (FASTA)
tool.description: Generation of a sequence toy data set for motif discovery in FASTA format.

param.name: p_motif
param.help: The motif that should be generated into random sequences. The Motif is typically 4 to 10 nucleotides long and should only contain the letters A,C,G, and T.
param.label: The Positive Motif

param.name: p_number_of_sequences
param.help: Number of sequences that should be generated--equal to the number of examples (typically between 10 and 10,000 sequences when used for learning)
param.label: Number of sequences

param.name: p_length
param.help: Length of the generated sequences (typically between 10 and 1000 nucleotides). This can also be a range of lengths, e.g. 30-50.
param.label: Sequence length (range)

param.name: p_position
param.help: Position at which the motif should be placed (should be between zero and the sequence length). This can also be a range, e.g. 10-20.
param.label: Motif position (range)

param.name: p_mutation_rate
param.help: Probability that a letter in the motif is replaced by a random letter
param.label: Motif mutation rate
